transcript_en:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Yes madam, greetings.
Customer: Yes hello sir, very good morning, is Sunderlal ji speaking?
Executive: Yes madam.
Customer: Yes very good morning sir, how are you?
Executive: I'm fine madam, how about you?
Customer: [inaudible] thank you. You called me just now, right?
Executive: Yes madam, I called you.
Customer: Yes, actually I was in a meeting so [inaudible].
Executive: Okay, no problem sister, no problem, no problem sister. No worries.
Customer: Yes. No worries. Did you then call the customer care number?
Executive: No, I only called that number.
Customer: Yes, you called my number, I didn't pick up, I couldn't pick up so it got forwarded from IndiaMART. No worries, do you need something [inaudible].
Executive: Yes, yes sir, tell me, you called?
Executive: Yes, what happened is that I put some products on the portal.
Executive: They are not showing. What's the matter, yes.
Customer: One second, let me open your profile.
Executive: Right now, one of my gels is called Vitcall, so a party from Odisha was checking, they couldn't find it on IndiaMART. Yes, so I have a party right now.
Executive: I, this was their brother.
Executive: Brother, SV Call, right?
Executive: SV Call calcium is madam 5 liters, that is not showing on IndiaMART, please check once.
Customer: Yes sir, which product is it, tell me again.
Executive: One is Vitcall gel, a party from Odisha came, they were searching, they couldn't find it. Vitcall gel.
Executive: And one, SV Call.
Customer: Yes Vitcall gel and one, one 5 liter calcium pack, SV Call. Yes. SV Call DS.
Customer: That's not there either. Just one minute, let me [inaudible].
Executive: Yes, please check once madam.
Customer: Yes, is there a G Call Gold sir, G Call?
Executive: No. No, G Call Gold is there madam, SV Call DS.
Customer: Okay sir. Apart from G Call, there is no calcium supplement, I have checked your [inaudible] as well.
Executive: Yes, that's what I uploaded just now.
Customer: Uploaded just now?
Executive: Yes, I uploaded this 15-16 days ago madam and this Vitcall gel, I uploaded it last year, understand that it's not [inaudible] but yes sir, G Vit veterinary growth water is there, Vitcall [inaudible].
Executive: Do one thing madam, just say hi to me on WhatsApp, so I will send you the picture, you can upload it please.
Customer: Yes, one second, I will upload it right now, don't worry, tell me the product name, what is it? Vitcall.
Executive: Yes Vitcall gel.
Customer: Perfect. Vitcall gel right sir? Is that the proper name?
Executive: Yes Vitcall gel.
Customer: Okay, so Vit, Call gel right sir?
Executive: Yes. Okay, I have added your product, what is the pricing, tell me quickly.
Executive: Madam something like 168.
Customer: 168 rupees, it comes in a bottle sir, it comes in a bottle right?
Executive: Yes, it comes in a bottle, a long neck bottle.
Executive: That's what I said, I will put the photo, then it will be easier for you.
Customer: No problem, just tell me, there are some things I need to add quickly. What is the packaging size? 50 grams, 100 grams, 500 grams, 300 ml.
Executive: 300 ml, 300 ml, 300 ml.
Customer: 30 ml?
Executive: No, 300 ml, 300 ml, yes.
Customer: Okay. How is the skin type, for which skin type is it? Oily skin, dry skin, combination skin, [inaudible] all type.
Executive: No, oral. All type. This is, madam, ionic calcium.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay, the packaging type is bottle, from cream gel, it's a gel right sir?
Executive: Vitcall gel yes.
Customer: Okay. Made in India and what is the minimum order quantity, how many bottles will you keep sir?
Executive: How much is it, 40 bottles.
Customer: 40 bottles?
Executive: Yes 40 bottles.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay, I have added this. Vitcall gel sir, what is it basically? Does it come in herbal gel or calcium [inaudible] what is it?
Executive: Yes. This madam is ionic gel, it's a calcium supplement.
Customer: It's a calcium supplement right?
Executive: Yes madam.
Customer: Okay so I will move it to calcium supplement [inaudible].
Customer: Okay. I will write here Vitcall gel calcium supplement, okay?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Calcium supplement. Sir, I have added your product, everything is added, okay? Now what I need is, I need the photos of this product, because it's your original product so I hope you have original photos, right sir?
Executive: Absolutely.
Customer: Yes so I need the photo from you sir, I have added your product to your profile. Now you will see it, only the photos are not added so send me the photo, I will do it on WhatsApp on the same message, okay?
Executive: And, I have one more madam. Yes.
Executive: SV Call DS calcium is 5 liters.
Executive: No, do one thing madam, just say hi to me on WhatsApp, whatever product is not showing, I will put it there.
Executive: Do you handle my account?
Customer: Yes madam.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Sir I will say hi on WhatsApp, okay?
Executive: Hello madam, listen.
Executive: Do you handle my account?
Customer: Yes I handle it sir, actually I wanted to talk to you before but you were a bit busy at that time, you got angry with me, you told my manager. No worries, now tell me about this too sir, an incorrect price, this Shialo animal syrup price.
Executive: [inaudible].
Customer: What is the price per portion?
Executive: Shialo's?
Customer: Yes, Shialo animal syrup, the 500 ml one.
Executive: Okay okay, madam, I will have to check, I am on duty right now, I will be able to tell you everything after 2 pm.
Customer: Okay no problem, then tell me after 3 pm because sir from 2 pm to 3 pm we have a break, a little lunch time sir.
Executive: No problem madam, and I am sorry for getting angry, I am a little, they keep bothering us. So I will, I will put all my products on WhatsApp after 3 pm, yes.
Customer: Okay sir, I will say hi to you on WhatsApp now, you share the photo there.
Executive: Okay madam.
Customer: Okay sir, thank you.

issues.problem: Products (Vitcall gel and SV Call DS calcium) are not showing up on IndiaMART.
issues.actionable_summary: Ensure all products are properly indexed and searchable on the platform. Investigate why the products were not visible and prevent recurrence.

issues.problem: Incorrect price for Shialo animal syrup.
issues.actionable_summary: Update the price of Shialo animal syrup in the seller's catalog.

issues.problem: Seller had a previous negative experience with the executive (getting angry).
issues.actionable_summary: Review the executive's previous interaction with the seller and provide coaching on maintaining a professional and courteous demeanor.

churn.churn_reason: No immediate indicators, but past negative experience needs addressing.

upsell.upsell_reason: The seller is focused on resolving existing issues rather than exploring new features.

call_summary: The seller called regarding products (Vitcall gel and SV Call DS calcium) not showing up on IndiaMART. The customer service executive added the Vitcall gel to the seller's catalog and requested the seller to send product photos via WhatsApp. The seller also inquired about an incorrect price for Shialo animal syrup, which the executive promised to address after 3 pm due to being on duty.

key_insights: Products not showing up in search is a critical issue affecting seller visibility.
Past negative interactions can impact seller perception and satisfaction.
llm_raw_response.original_summary:
Concerns:

- Products not showing on IndiaMART portal.

- Vitcall gel and SV Call calcium not visible.

- Incorrect price for Shialo animal syrup.



Resolution:

- Executive added Vitcall gel to the profile.

- Agreed to share product photos via WhatsApp.

- Will check and inform about Shialo syrup price.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to send 'Hi' on WhatsApp.

- Executive to share product photos.

- Executive to provide Shialo syrup price after 3 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product visibility, catalog, whatsapp, pricing, calcium
